item.title: Storage Engineer for EMC VMAX 100K - create LUN and erase data - Upwork
item.description:
Remotely guide me though Unisphere software (v.8.4.0.15) to complete the tasks for create LUN's for afterward do Data Erasure on a EMC VMAX 100K storage system.

External data erasure software will be used for erasure of the LUN's.

You must be an expert for EMC storage and Unisphere v.8.


Posted On: June 24, 2020 08:22 UTC
Category: Data Mining & Management
Country: Denmark

item.title: Node.js Script to pull data from a source - Upwork
item.description:
**PLEASE READ THE COMPLETE JOB DESCRIPTION & RESPOND**

Overview of the work (additional access & details will be shared upon interview eligibility)

- A specific set of data is coming from "water temperature checking devices"
- This data is stored into AWS
- You will need to create a simple automated script/API that could:
a) Categorize data into specified tabs/columns
b) Ready to be consumable by any other third-party website/app to integrate this script/API directly from AWS
NOTE: A part of the script is already built in Python, however, we want this to be re-built in Node.js (so you have a great reference already which makes your work easier)

You should:
1. Have knowledge of working with AWS

2. An expert in Node.js

3. Have some knowledge of Python (will help you to refer to the existing work)
Please use the word quarantine at the start of your response so I know you read through carefully.

4. Should be willing to work on a long-term association
Note that a Phase 2 of this work is already on papers - which will involve creating a Dashboard for the vendors & Admin - therefore, we are looking for a team-player who could continue to work with us on this project as it is expanded.

This job is open for Hourly, however, once we have mutually agreed upon an estimation, we would like to award the job on a fixed contract.

All the best!
Team RFWT


Posted On: June 24, 2020 08:17 UTC
Category: Scripting & Automation
Skills:Node.js, Python, Scripting, API Development, API
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: (Russian Language Only) RNN / CNN data scientist/engineer specializing in YOLO / OpenCV - Upwork
item.description:
We are an American company working on future products for our firm.
Our A.I. team is in Russia and we need to add another CNN / RNN. specialists /programmers who would help with improving the accuracy of our CNN and RNN networks for image-related processing.

An individual would possess:
- understanding of RNN /CNN and other image processing techniques
- YOLO / ROLO / LSTM experience welcomed
- be able to code in Python, C, or other languages
- capable of working with other team members
- speak Russian

In order to preserve team cohesiveness and work quality, offers from other companies will not be accepted. Only individuals based in Russia and speaking fluent Russian will be considered for this project.

During selection process individuals will be interviewed to understand their capabilities.

The team is truly an amazing collection of very gifted individuals who love solving problems. We understand that it is hard to know everything, and if you are an individual willing to learn and can put your mind to it - we would be happy to talk to you as well!

You will be expected to sign an NDA and work cannot be published / shared outside the scope of the project.


Posted On: June 24, 2020 08:03 UTC
Category: Deep Learning
Skills:TensorFlow, Python, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Deep Neural Networks, Neural Networks, Artificial Neural Networks, OpenCV, Deep Learning, PyTorch, C++, Keras, Computer Vision
Country: Japan
click to apply

item.title: OAuth setup for Lumen with Laravel Passport or similar - Upwork
item.description:
We are a web technology agency based in Berlin, Germany. We are working on wide area of web development and content management systems. We are looking for an experienced consultant to help us with a focused OAuth setup.

Your skills

- OAuth integrations and server configuration experience
- Lumen development experience (or able to learn fast)
- Laravel Passport or similar technology experience
- 5+ years of work work experience

We are thinking to build something like this (not a strict specification, but gives an idea what we would need): https://medium.com/the-andela-way/setting-up-oauth-in-lumen-using-laravel-passport-2de9d007e0b0

Hourly Range: $25.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 24, 2020 08:02 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:PHP, Lumen Micro Framework, OAuth, Web Application, Laravel, API
Country: Germany
click to apply

item.title: Developer needed to do simple Wordpress and javascript modifications - Upwork
item.description:
This would be ongoing little changes as needed.

Today we need to have some features turned off for some of our pages. We would like chatbox, header and footer to be optional per page.

Today we also need the ability to have a button on the page to send you back to the page you came from. ( keeping some information in the URL )

Looking for someone that is always available to quickly jump in and make a few changes as the need comes up.

Must be able to speak English fluently and be willing to talk over video chat sometimes or audio as a minimum as I will screen share to show what I need.

MUST use the upwork screen time recording as we need to go back and see the changes made.

If this sounds like you... please respond quickly as I will hire today!

We are going live in a few days and then it will get crazy :)

https://www.thegcard.com/mike/?firstname=OurFutureProgrammer

Thanks,
Mike Helm


Posted On: June 24, 2020 07:54 UTC
Category: Front-End Development
Skills:WordPress, JavaScript, CSS
Country: Canada
click to apply
